product_name: Big Agnes Rattlesnake SL 4 mtnGLO Tent
long_description: Built-in mtnGLOTM lighting, ample space and a 2-door / 2-vestibule design make this 4-person, 3-season backpacking tent a comfortable, convenient shelter for your adventures in the wilderness.
short_description: Built-in mtnGLOTM lighting, ample space and a 2-door / 2-vestibule design make this 4-person, 3-season backpacking tent a comfortable, convenient shelter for your adventures in the wilderness.
